item.title: Novelty In Software Engineering
item.description: In the 1940s Bell Aircraft used an experimental approach to build the first commercial helicopter:ยน At Gardenville, we built things, tested them, modified them until they worked, and then made the drawings. — The Bell Notes, Arthur M. Young, The project manager contrasted this with how they built airplanes: The main engineering group made drawings, sent them to the plant, and only the project manager ever saw the product fly.
